B

BasicDominoLine - Class in domino_project
This class represents the 'basic' DominoLine according to the idea: matching side of tiles means adding to Line.
BasicDominoLine() - Constructor for class domino_project.BasicDominoLine
 
Board - Class in domino_project
This class represents the Board on which any type of DominoGame happens.It consists of the line on where the tiles are put on.
Board() - Constructor for class domino_project.Board
 
board - Variable in class domino_project.MultiplayerGame
The board of the MultiplayerGame.
